CustomField.formula: IF( Opportunity.IsClosed= True, "No", IF( Existing_Service__c = True, "Yes", IF( isReportable_Text__c = "Valid" && ! ISBLANK(Quote_Line_Item__c) , "Yes", IF( isReportable_Text__c = "Invalid", "No", /*IF( isReportable_Text__c = "Valid" && ISBLANK(Quote_Line_Item__c)&& Opportunity.Count_of_Quote__c = 0 , "Yes",*/ IF( isReportable_Text__c = "Valid" && ISBLANK(Quote_Line_Item__c), "No", "Error in Formula" )))))/*)*/
CustomField.label: Editable
